Name: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com
About the game: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com is a small metroidvania about a ghost hunter named Ruby. One Halloween night a ghost hunting job comes in, but it turns out to not be a regular gig! Features: -5 different interconnected spooky areas to fight through. -50+ rooms to explore! -6 spooky bosses to defeat. -Find and pet all 8 lost cats! -Items to boost Rubys power and gain new abilities! -Ghost buddies, cats, shopkeepers, and others to meet within the mansion.
Meta Title: Spooky Ghosts Dot Com: Aug 3, 2018, Zertuk and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Spooky Ghosts Dot Com? Check out the release date (Aug 3, 2018), developer insights from Zertuk, and a complete game summary.
